TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlUrlEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor

summary.span: 提供使用者介面，用來選取指示 XML 檔案位置的 URL。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL that indicates the location of an XML file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是提供一個對話方塊以選取表示的 XML 檔案位置的 URL。 is a that provides a dialog for selecting a URL that indicates the location of an XML file. ## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Caption As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要在 [選取對話方塊] 視窗中顯示的標題。

span.span: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog window.

value.span: 要在 [選取對話方塊] 視窗中顯示的標題。

span.span: The caption to display on the selection dialog window.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得編輯器的檔名篩選條件字串。

span.span: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.

summary.span: 這是用來判斷出現在對話方塊的檔案清單中的項目。

span.span: This is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.

value.span: 字串，包含有關對話方塊中可用之檔案篩選選項的資訊。

span.span: A string that contains information about the file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指定兩個篩選選項的篩選字串： 一個用於 XML 檔案 (\*.xml)，另一個用於所有檔案 (\*。\*)。The property specifies a filter string with two filter options: one for XML files (\*.xml), and one for all files (\*.\*). 篩選字串，包含一或多個篩選選項。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每個篩選選項包含描述的篩選，後面接著分隔號 (|) 和篩選模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同的篩選選項的字串會以分隔號分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 包含兩個篩選選項的篩選條件字串的範例如下:"`XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 您可以指定篩選選項中的數種篩選模式以分號區隔篩選模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 中的第一個篩選選項會指定兩個篩選條件模式的篩選條件字串的範例如下:"`Custom XML Files (*.xml;*.xlst)|*.xml;*.xlst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"。The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies two filter patterns: "`Custom XML Files (*.xml;*.xlst)|*.xml;*.xlst|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Options As UrlBuilderOptions

summary.span: 取得 URL 產生器 (Builder) 使用的選項。

span.span: Gets the options for the URL builder to use.

value.span: ，表示 URL 產生器使用的選項。

span.span: A that indicates the options for the URL builder to use.
